title: Bloomberg Markets: Warriors'  Iguodala on Basketball, VC

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Andre Tyler Iguodala Professional Basketball Player Golden State Warriors Discussing why he came to Golden State, his tech venture into skin care and the upcoming player's tech summit.
